result.title: HumbleFool Cup 2018
result.content:
IIIT Allahabad is back with the second version of HumbleFool Cup, held in the memory of Harsha Suryanarayana humblefool

It consists of two rounds, Qualifying and Onsite. The top 30 students located in India will be invited to compete onsite at Indian Institute of Information Technology, Allahabad. The best ranked student in the qualifying round (not located in India) will be awarded $100 prize money.

The top 30 best students from the qualifying round will compete onsite to win the Humblefool Cup Medals and $450 in cash and goodies. The finalists will also receive Topcoder Humblefool Cup T-shirts.
